Quality Education.reason: The course provides specialized higher education in computer networks and information systems, contributing to quality technical education for senior university students.
evidence: Business Data Communication is a mandatory course exclusively intended for senior students majoring in Management Information Systems.

Acquire the knowledge and skills required to implement basic network-based programs.
